title: Miss Fortune's Captain Fortune skin was originally the VU wasn't it?
body:
Maybe I'm wrong but it sure seems that way.
For a few reasons:
- I can easily see Captain Fortune being pulled as default MF and changed into a skin because the VU changes might upset too many people.
 -Skins usually place champions in a drastically different setting or role. Miss Fortune goes from slutty pirate hunter to less slutty pirate hunter. Why would a pirate need a pirate themed skin?
-She tries to share the spotlight with GP as an updated champion in the event although her changes aren't nearly as significant.
-MF's login screen [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e31QrnOZoyg) uses Captain Fortune rather than default MF. Like other things, it might be a remnant of when captain fortune was the VU. (graves and tf have new skins but don't use them in their login screen)
-5 is usually the number of skins riot gives each theme but this event has 6 (graves, tf, garen, quinn, aatrox, and MF)

Again, maybe I'm nitpicking but I would not be surprised if this was the case.

Hey Ruarik,

Captain Fortune wasn't intended to be her VU. We created this skin for the Bilgewater event. 

>  I can easily see Captain Fortune being pulled as default MF and changed into a skin because the VU changes might upset too many people.
-Skins usually place champions in a drastically different setting or role. Miss Fortune goes from slutty pirate hunter to less slutty pirate hunter. Why would a pirate need a pirate themed skin?

As originally stated on the Champion Update page, Miss Fortune's VU would be minor, as opposed to something large-scale like Sion. 

> 5 is usually the number of skins riot gives each theme but this event has 6 (graves, tf, garen, quinn, aatrox, and MF)

We don't have a hard set number for skins for an event. If we have opportunities to give more champions a skin because they tie in with the event, we'll absolutely do it! :]
Well, conspiracies are at least fun while they last. Thanks for the reply!

i know i'm WAY late to the party, and 99% certain i wouldn't get a reply even if i said it when this was all still going down, but this has been really bothering me. what made riot decide to shaft MF out of the visual and VO rework/update she deserves. you gave gangplank to reflect his real character, why not both or the other way around(make mf the character in game that she is in her lore and leave gp the same he was before)? there is really no reason other than to sell a skin, for riot to keep her current classic skin. her current classic skin and VO in no way reflect MF's current character in her new lore. she should have gotten the exact same treatment gangplank got with his update. the new gankplank is the same gankplank in his lore whereas mf in game is not. keeping MF's classic skin and VO is the same thing if you had kept gangplanks old VO and classic skin and sold captain gankplank and/or his new classic skin. right now you have to spend 975 RP just to get the visually accurate version of what MF really is in her current lore(which is also 100x better imo) but even if you do buy the skin you are still left with the wrong character VO that in no way reflects who MF is now. she really got left behind on her update. gankplanks update is awesome and reflects his new badass character lore, while mf is stuck as a sleezy bounty hunter and not the badass character she should be. after i read her new lore and the info from the bilgewater event i bought MF thinking that i was buying the character i read about. i was sorely mistaken, and very disappointed when i found out that the character in MF's lore wasn't actually gonna be a character in the game, just someone else with the same name.
